entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Blowing snow early in the morning. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon.
